CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 催促；敦促；鼓励；力劝；驱策；恳求；激励；竭力主张；大力推荐；促进；推动；刺激；煽动；怂恿
强烈欲望；冲动；迫切需求；渴望；推动力；驱动力；迫切的愿望

synonym.mean: 强烈的欲望，迫切要求；推动力

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指用好话善意或耐心劝诱、哄骗某人做某事。
语气强，指不断地热情地规劝诱导。
普通用词，指通过劝说、感情交流等而使对方做劝说者所希望的事。
指用讲道理来使某人做某事。
较正式用词，指对一些较重大事情所提出的劝告。有时也用于非正式场合，但仍强调严肃的一面。
指凭行动、事实或言语使他人从思想感情上信服。

word_group.brief_definition: 感到迫切的欲望；感到强烈的推动力

bilingual.source: She is resisting the urge to eat sweets.
bilingual.target: 她在抵抗吃甜食的冲动。

bilingual.source: She tried hard to resist the urge to cry.
bilingual.target: 她努力抵制住了哭泣的冲动。

bilingual.source: He couldn't resist the urge to check his phone.
bilingual.target: 他无法抗拒冲动去查看他的手机。

bilingual.source: She felt an urge to call her old friend.
bilingual.target: 她感到一种冲动想要给她的老朋友打电话。

bilingual.source: He felt a sudden urge for peeing during the meeting.
bilingual.target: 他在会议中突然有了小便的冲动。

bilingual.source: She had an uncontrollable urge to eat chocolate.
bilingual.target: 她有一种无法控制的吃巧克力的冲动。

bilingual.source: He resists the urge to check his phone during meetings.
bilingual.target: 他抵抗住了在会议中查看手机的冲动。

bilingual.source: The urge to laugh was overpowering during the serious meeting.
bilingual.target: 在严肃的会议上，笑的冲动是压倒性的。

bilingual.source: She resisted the urge to check her phone during the meeting.
bilingual.target: 她抵抗住了在会议期间查看手机的冲动。

bilingual.source: The urge to check my phone during the meeting was resistible.
bilingual.target: 在会议期间查看手机的冲动是可抵抗的。

list.abstract: urge（英 [ɜːdʒ]，美 [ɜːrdʒ]），英语单词。作动词为力劝；恳求；鼓励。作名词为强烈欲望；冲动。例句：An urge to be generous to the claimants（对索赔者慷慨大方的冲动）. 近义词动词有crowd。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't have an urge to fling my waste.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我没有扔自己排泄物的冲动。

yingyinNormal.en: It's bad enough I had to give in to my urge to create a rigid schedule.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我没克制住冲动做了一个严格的时间表就已经够堕落了。

yingyinNormal.en: Bernadette's urge to shun, scowl or fling her waste at Priya is hard-wired into her DNA.
yingyinNormal.zh: 伯纳黛特想要躲避，发怒，或是用排泄物扔普丽娅的冲动是与生俱来的。

yingyinNormal.en: So, go get one. I can't just give in to every urge I have when I have it. That's why I have a rigid schedule.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你就去买一个吃啊。我不能一有冲动就对自己妥协啊。这就是为什么我必须按表操课。

yingyinNormal.en: Gore Vidal once wrote that power is an end to itself, and the instinctive urge to prevail the most important single human trait.
yingyinNormal.zh: 戈尔·维达尔曾写道，权力是其自身的终结，而夺取胜利的本能冲动是人类最为重要的特性。

yingyinNormal.en: Detective, whatever your plans, I urge you to be discreet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 警探，不管你有何计划，一定要谨慎。

yingyinNormal.en: Sir, I urge you not to leave this room. Excuse me. Please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 先生，我建议您不要离开这间屋子。不好意思。请您考虑一下。

yingyinNormal.en: Your Majesty, I urge you to engage the Guardian with all haste.
yingyinNormal.zh: 国王陛下，恳请您即刻召唤守护者来保护大家。

yingyinNormal.en: And yet you can be in two places at once. I urge you to remain in Starfleet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过，你可以一人分饰两角了。我支持你继续留在星际舰队。

yingyinNormal.en: And predators had an uncontrollable biological urge to maim, and maul, and...
yingyinNormal.zh: 而食肉动物无法遏制的本能让他们捕猎，残杀，还有…

yingyinNormal.en: So I urge superman to come to this hill of the people tomorrow to see those who have suffered.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以我呼吁超人明天来到国会山，来看看那些受苦的人们。

yingyinNormal.en: I can slip in and out, anywhere I like, you know. When I get the urge. HH Holmes. Murder Castle. But done right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可以随意出入我想去的任何地方，当我犯瘾时。HH·霍姆斯。谋杀城堡。但做得更好。

yingyinNormal.en: But the danger is, once we begin the rebels will not stop calling for retribution. Thirst for blood is a difficult urge to satisfy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是危险在于，一旦我们处死这些人，叛军们就停不下来了，杀人是会上瘾的。

yingyinNormal.en: And so I urge you all to wake up and to tune in and to influence the genomic revolution that's happening all around you. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以我强烈期望你们所有人醒悟并参与到这场发生在你们周围的基因革命。谢谢。

yingyinNormal.en: Listen, again, I want to urge you to push the duck special, because if they don't eat the duck, you're going to, and it's not very good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听着，我要你们推销鸭肉特餐，因为如果客人不吃鸭肉，你们得吃，它不是很好吃。

yingyinNormal.en: So if you have any power or any say in what they do or how they use you, please, please, urge them to stop this war before it's too late.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，如果你对他们的行动，对他们如何利用你有说话权的话，求你，求你了，要求他们停止这场战争吧，现在还为时不晚。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 紧迫的；急迫的；紧要的；紧急的

word_family.mean: v. 力劝；恳求；鼓励；强烈要求；激励；竭力主张；使加快；使加速

sense_info_list.en: try earnestly or persistently to persuade someone to do something

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Urge</highlight> consumers to cut the use of plastics
examination_example.sentence_trans: 敦促消费者减少塑料的使用

examination_example.sentence: According to Cline, mass-market labels <highlight>urge</highlight> consumers to shop for their garments more frequently.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据克林特的说法，大众市场的标签敦促消费者更频繁地购买他们的服装。

examination_example.sentence: Last year a federal task-force <highlight>urged</highlight> reform for patents related to genetic tests.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去年，一个联邦工作组敦促对基因检测相关的专利进行改革。

examination_example.sentence: An <highlight>urge</highlight> to be generous to the claimants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对索赔者慷慨大方的冲动。

examination_example.sentence: One of these <highlight>urges</highlight> has to do with creating a state of peace in the midst of turbulence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些欲望之一与在动荡中创造一种平和的状态相关。

examination_example.sentence: Another <highlight>urge</highlight> or need is so intrinsic that we are barely ever conscious of its abiding claims on us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种欲望或需求是与生俱来的以至于我们几乎没有意识到它长久以来的诉求。

sense_info_list.en: a strong and restless desire, especially a continuing impulse toward an activity or goal

examination_example.sentence: There is no doubt that gardens evidence an irrepressible <highlight>urge</highlight> to create, express, fashion, and beautify.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毫无疑问，花园表明了人们抑制不住的，想要去创造、表达、追求潮流和美化的强烈意愿。

examination_example.sentence: These gardens speak of various other fundamental <highlight>urges</highlight>, beyond that of decoration and creative expression.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些花园显示出了人类除了想要装饰和彰显个人创造力之外的各种其他基本意愿。

word_usage.usage:
urge作动词时，可接名词、动名词或that从句作宾语，从句中的谓语动词多用虚拟式；有时也可接由动词不定式充当补足语的复合宾语。例：
We urged that the bill should be passed.
我们强烈要求通过那项议案。

urge作动词时，urge sb. to do sth.意为“催促/力劝某人做某事”，并隐指被劝者有相悖的回应。例：
I strongly urge you to give up smoking.
我力劝你戒烟。

urge作名词，表“欲望；冲动”时，后可接to do sth.表示“……的冲动”。例：
I had a sudden urge to hit him.
我突然很想揍他一顿。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 紧急地；迫切地；急切地
adj. 紧迫的；急迫的；紧要的；紧急的

word_family.mean: v. 力劝；恳求；鼓励；强烈要求；激励；竭力主张；使加快；使加速

sense_info_list.en: a strong and restless desire, especially a continuing impulse toward an activity or goal

examination_example.sentence: Therefore, it's hard for these parents to fight the <highlight>urge</highlight> to follow their kids' every move so that they never get hurt.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以，这些父母很难克服跟随孩子一举一动的冲动，以确保孩子不会受到伤害。

sense_info_list.en: try earnestly or persistently to persuade someone to do something
undertake the accomplishment of with energy, swiftness, or enthusiasm

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 紧急地；迫切地；急切地
adj. 紧迫的；急迫的；紧要的；紧急的

word_family.mean: v. 力劝；恳求；鼓励；强烈要求；激励；竭力主张；使加快；使加速

sense_info_list.en: try earnestly or persistently to persuade someone to do something

examination_example.sentence: First Minister Nicola Sturgeon <highlight>urged</highlight> ScottishPower to reduce carbon emissions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首席部长Nicola Sturgeon敦促苏格兰电力公司减少碳排放。

examination_example.sentence: In a new clinical report, they are <highlight>urging</highlight> doctors to prescribe it liberally to the children in their care.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一份新的临床报告中，他们敦促医生为来看病的孩子开出大量这一处方。

examination_example.sentence: USPS <highlight>urges</highlight> those without standing addresses to file change-of-address forms with their new location.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国邮政总局敦促那些没有固定地址的人用他们的新地址提交地址变更表。

sense_info_list.en: a strong and restless desire; especially a continuing impulse toward an activity or goal

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 紧急地；迫切地；急切地
adj. 紧迫的；急迫的；紧要的；紧急的

word_family.mean: v. 力劝；恳求；鼓励；强烈要求；激励；竭力主张；使加快；使加速

sense_info_list.en: try earnestly or persistently to persuade someone to do something

examination_example.sentence: If I learned of a company which used a lot of plastic, I'd send it an email <highlight>urging</highlight> it to cut back.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我知道一家公司使用大量的塑料，我会给他发一封电子邮件，敦促他减少使用塑料。

sense_info_list.en: a strong and restless desire, especially a continuing impulse toward an activity or goal

examination_example.sentence: I never felt an <highlight>urge</highlight> to learn any sign language before.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我以前从未有过学习任何手语的冲动。
